website_summaries.verdict: Natural and medicinal ingredients combine for versatile anti-inflammatory and pain relief.
pros: Contains natural ingredients and is toxin-, oil-, and aspirin-free
Convenient squeeze tube works well on-the-go
Dries fast and the smell fades pretty quickly after application
cons: May not be strong enough for some users dealing with higher levels of pain or discomfort

customer_reviews.title: I've been a long distance runner for over 40 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long distance runner for over 40 years and for the last decade or two I've been a big fan of Doctor Hoy's. When my legs are sore and I don't think I can go on a run,I rub some on and most of the time the discomfort fades.... It doesn't cure everything but it certainly does a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Amazing Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have knee pain and arthritis. I loved that it takes away the pain very fast! It does have a menthol smell that is pleasant to me but the smell goes away quickly. It absorbs into the skin and dries non-greasy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Do4Silks

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Cryogel, Tiger Balm, China Gel or Biofreeze
customer_reviews.text: It serves the same purpose as brands listed, but a little bit goes a long way. Smooth, not sticky, quick drying and one application soothes you for about 12 hours. It still smells as mentholated as the others, but at least it's not sticking to (or staining) your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time we ordered Dr. Hoy's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we ordered Dr. Hoy's product... my wife uses it every night for knee pain relief.... she really needs knee surgery but the doctors won't do it because of her age. So Dr. Hoy's to the rescue, along with the help of a walker, she still goes to work every day at 84 years old! HB
customer_reviews.author: HERB BELL

customer_reviews.title: it provides good pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before, it provides good pain relief. My doctor has even used it and it helped her too!
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: so this is a great gel to have on hand for pain relief when ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and does not retain an odor after it dries, so this is a great gel to have on hand for pain relief when you have to go to work or church and don't want to smell like menthol & camphor!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Hood

customer_reviews.title: I am pleasantly surprised to find out this really does ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised to find out this really does help. Have had fibro for many years, with particular pain in hips and neck. This lotion is a bit pricey, but when it means I can get to sleep, it's worth it! Just a heads up: it has a strong smell, and while the label says the smell dissipates, it actually sticks around on pillowcases, sheets and sleepwear. Not overwhelming but definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lecuyer

customer_reviews.title: CRAZY wanted same amount of$ for lesser size

customer_reviews.text: Great for sore muscles the day after your workout! Especially great for arthritis! Wear under compression shorts or shirts, etc. for fast relief!

product_meta.title: DOCTOR HOY’S Natural Pain Relief Gel, Water Based with Arnica a Natural Anti-Inflammatory, Includes 5% Camphor & 5% Menthol in a Time Release Delivery for Long Lasting Pain Relief, 8 oz. Bottle
feature_bullets: A powerful sensation of cool to warm provides ultimate relief, 8 oz. pain relief gel in convenient flip top bottle
Witch Hazel draws the ingredients in while the Timed Release Menthol allows relief to last several hours
Arnica Montana aggressively targets inflammation to help ease pain quickly
Layering the Gel, allowing a few minutes between applications, will increase strength and promote longer lasting relief
High-quality ingredients are non-toxic and paraben free, safe and effective for repeated use, has a vanishing scent, and contains no oils which means no staining
